extensionDescription.message: Adds a notification message with the current page URL to a prowl account.

titleActionSend.description: The text shown as the page action title.

apiKeyMissing.message: API Key not set, please set one on the options page before trying to send to prowl!
apiKeyMissing.description: Explains that the API key must be set before send to prowl can be used.

urlMissing.message: Tab has no location, can't send to prowl!
urlMissing.description: Explains that a blank location isn't useful to send to prowl.

sentSuccess.description: Tells the user that the message was successfully sent to prowl.

sentUnauthorized.message: The Prowl API returned with a result of 'Unauthorized.' Please check your API key and try again.
sentUnauthorized.description: The message shown when the prowl api returns a 401.

options_apiKeyLabel.description: Text shown in the settings page describing where to get an API key.

options_apiKey.message: If you don't have an API key, get one here
options_apiKey.description: Text shown in the settings page describing where to get an API key.

options_priorityLabel.description: Text shown in the settings page for the label for priority.

options_priority.message: Default value of Normal (0). Emergency priority messages may bypass quiet hours according to your settings in Prowl.
options_priority.description: Text shown in the settings page describing message priority.

options_priority_n2.description: Option text for priority: very low. (-2)

options_save.description: Text shown on the button to save options.

options_sponsor.description: Text on the options page to link to sponsoring the author.

sentFailure.description: Tells the user what went wrong.

sentException.message: Exception occured when trying to call the Prowl API: $MSG$
sentException.description: Tells the user what went wrong in the case of an exception.
